post.author: 김태희
post.content:
Windows Mobile App Developer
About the Job
Our downtown client is searching for a Senior .NET developer with Windows Mobile application design/development experience. This role is to integrate a custom application with Dexterra Mobile software.
Must Haves: MS .NET (preferably C# language) with Windows Mobile application design/development experience
Nice to Haves: MS Visual Studio 2005, MS Windows Mobile 5.0 Pocket PC SDK, MS .NET Compact Framework, XML


Job Summary
Location
Toronto, ON M5K1J5
Industries
Computer/​IT Services
Job Type
Part Time
Temporary/​Contract/​Project
Salary
60.​00 - 65.​00 CAD /​hour
Job Reference Code

post.title: Windows Mobile
